original_text: Thus the sin of the young men was very great in the sight of the Lord, for the men treated the offering of the Lord with contempt.
korean_text: 이 소년들의 죄가 여호와 앞에 심히 큼은 그들이 여호와의 제사를 멸시함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Thus the sin of the young men was very great
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그 청년들의 죄가 매우 컸다

sentences.original_text: in the sight of the Lord,
for the men treated the offering of the Lord
